item.title: Scripting for Animation 2
item.description: This course is a little different because it’s for 2D animation students. However there is still a need to know or be somewhat familiar with technical aspects that are often involved in 2D animation.

item.title: Scripting for animation 2 course timeline
item.description: Course Timeline Unit 1 - Project Management Weeks 1-4: Knowledge Management Learning Naming Conventions Style Guides Team work Version control Unit 2 - Scripting Weeks 5: Introduction to scripting Fundamentals of programming variables control flow data types practice!
